channel.title: Event. need some help
channel.description:
hey.
im making a x-mas event for my server and i need some help with this..
the player needs a ´wrapped candy´ item: 14084 they can get candy from a npc. i need the santa npc to trade the candy in to a sled.
so.. if you talk to the santa with a wrapped candy in your inventory the santa trades the candy for a sled.
how do i do this?
excuse me for my bad english + explaining the problem.

item.title: Event. need some help
item.dc:creator: @jaspertje80 jaspertje80
item.description:
@jaspertje80 wrote:

[quote=“chazion, post:3, topic:425157”]I think I understand…

Here’s a basic layout… assuming you’re using Project Insanity or a similar base?

[code=java]
//make some dialogue in dialogueHandler
//Find the firstClickNpc w/e and string some dialogue you used
//make the option you choose on the dialogue handle this statement
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(####,####)) {
//remove the item
//add the new item
} else {
//send a message saying you don’t have the required item
}

post your code here if you run into problems…

[/code][/quote]
im using project instantly
thanks for your help.

edit:

what is the code for removing an item?
i have the code for giving the item but not for the removing.

Read full topic

item.title: Event. need some help
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

I think I understand…

Here’s a basic layout… assuming you’re using Project Insanity or a similar base?

//make some dialogue in dialogueHandler
//Find the firstClickNpc w/e and string some dialogue you used
//make the option you choose on the dialogue handle this statement
if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(####,####)) {
       //remove the item
        //add the new item
         } else {
         //send a message saying you don't have the required item
}


post your code here if you run into problems..
